item.title: Borderlands 4 Was The Best-Selling Game In September
item.content:encoded:
The latest video game sales data for the United States (US) has been announced, and Borderlands 4 was the best-selling game in September 2025.

The new data comes from industry firm Circana, which posted the data ranging from August 31 to October 4.

Following Borderlands 4 for the month was NBA 2K26, which used back-to-back strong months to become the best-selling game of the year so far. Rounding out the top five for September were EA Sports FC 26, Ghost of Yotei, and Madden NFL 26. That means three of the top five games for the month were sports games.

When looking at the full top 20 for the month, nearly half of the games were new releases. Aside from the aforementioned titles above, Silent Hill f, Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles, NHL 26, Digimon Story: Time Stranger, and Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 all hit the top 20 for the first time.

You can check out the full list of best-selling games for September below. And be sure to leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: 7 New Games Announced as Coming Soon to Xbox Game Pass
item.content:encoded:
In a post on social media and the Xbox Wire, the team at Microsoft has revealed seven new games coming to Xbox Game Pass. It’s a mixed list that includes a space-faring RPG, a cleaning simulator, and Football Manager on both PC and consoles. The list is mostly made up of games coming to the service on day one of their respective releases.

Read on to get the full list of games coming to Xbox Game Pass in the coming weeks.

Next Games Coming to Game Pass

In a post on the Xbox Wire, the next array of titles coming to Xbox Game Pass was revealed.

PowerWash Simulator 2 (October 23)

PowerWash Simulator is back, bubbling with fresh locations, soap-erior equipment, and splashy features. Effortlessly transform soiled surroundings into clean, serene scenes, solo or with pals. Satisfaction is a spray away!

Bounty Star (October 23)

Bounty Star is an over-the-shoulder 3D action game that marries mech combat and customization with farming and base building. The player takes on the role of a broken but powerful ex-soldier named Clem, a war veteran, talented fighte,r and expert mech pilot.

Super Fantasy Kingdom (October 24)

Rebuild your kingdom and explore a vibrant fantasy world in this roguelite city builder. Defeat hordes of monsters with a unique team of defenders as you harvest, build, mine, cook, brew, and grow. But if your defenses should fail, be prepared to watch it all burn!

Halls of Torment (October 28)

Slay hordes of terrifying monsters in this horde survival roguelite. Descend into the Halls of Torment where the Lords of the Underworld await you. Treasures, magical trinkets, and a growing cast of heroes will grant you the power to vanquish these horrors from beyond. How long can you survive?

The Outer Worlds 2 (October 29)

The Outer Worlds 2 is the eagerly-awaited sequel to the award-winning first-person sci-fi RPG from Obsidian Entertainment (just look at the exciting number of dashes in this sentence!). Time to clear your calendar – get ready for an action-packed adventure with a new crew, new weapons, and new enemies in a new colony!

1000xResist (November 4)

1000xResist is a thrilling sci-fi adventure. The year is unknown, and a disease spread by an alien invasion keeps you underground. You are Watcher. You dutifully fulfil your purpose in serving the Allmother, until the day you discover a shocking secret that changes everything.

Football Manager 26 (November 4)

New foundations set the stage for you to define your football destiny. Built on the Unity engine, FM26 is the legacy, redefined, and where storytelling evolves, placing you at the heart of the beautiful game. A reimagined interface and more immersive matchday experience bring you closer to the action and combine to elevate every decision and match-defining moment.

Which game are you most looking forward to coming to Xbox Game Pass? Let me know on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Remedy Entertainment CEO Moves On from Role After Nearly a Decade
item.content:encoded:
Remedy Entertainment’s CEO is stepping down with immediate effect, having held the position since August 2016.

Things have not been looking very good for Remedy recently, primarily due to the FBC: Firebreak’s lacklustre launch. Remedy’s now former CEO provided a statement on this topic a little over a week ago, revealing that the game has not met internal sales targets. Now, the latest update from the company shows that the CEO is stepping down.

According to a new press release from Remedy Entertainment, Tero Virtala, the company’s CEO, and the board of directors have mutually decided that Virtala will step down from his position “with immediate effect.” The search process for a new CEO will start immediately, and “Virtala will continue at the service of the company during an agreed transition period to support the handover of CEO duties.”

A new interim CEO has been appointed from Remedy’s Board of Directors. Markus Mäki, one of the founders of the company, a member of the board since 1995, and the Chairman of the Board, will be appointed as the interim CEO, effective as of October 22, 2025. Mäki is also “a member of the company’s core management team responsible for production.” Mäki will step down as Chairman of the Board, and Henri Österlund will take his place.

Here’s what Remedy’s Interim CEO, Markus Mäki, had to say about Tero Virtala:

“I want to thank Tero Virtala for his substantial contribution to the management of Remedy since 2016. I personally thank Tero for good cooperation and wish him all the best for the future.”

item.title: NBA 2K26 Is The Best-Selling Game Of 2025 In The US
item.content:encoded:
NBA 2K26 is the best-selling game in the United States (US) so far in 2025.

According to the latest sales data from Circana, despite the game not being the top-selling game for September—more on that later—, it has jumped to the top spot for the year.

Its move to the number one position pushes Monster Hunter Wilds down to second after it had been at the top since its February release. Rounding out the top 5 for the year, as of October 4, are Borderlands 4, EA Sports College Football 26, and The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered.

You can check out the rest of the Top 20 best-selling games for 2025 below. In addition to game sales, the latest video game hardware sales data for September 2025 was revealed.

item.title: Complete Ball X Pit Trophy List—How To Get All Achievements & Trophies
item.content:encoded:
Kenny Sun’s genius Ball X Pit is a fresh take on the roguelike genre with block-busting and ball-bouncing mechanics. Funnily enough, the Ball X Pit trophy list is sure to have you bouncing from wall to wall to clear out its exhausting list of accomplishments.

Each game’s trophy list ranges from story-related trophies to wacky out out-there tasks you’d never even think to do. We’d argue that Ball X Pit‘s trophy list is a long but simple one—you need to grind more than if you played every Tony Hawk’s game back to back.

It’s to be expected with roguelikes, so let’s take a deeper dive into Ball X Pit‘s trophy list and achievements.

All Ball X Pit Trophies & Achievements

Adjust your eyes when reading this list, as the onslaught of caps might make your eyes sore. But once you start dissecting the entire Ball X Pit trophy list, you’ll see the achievements and trophies are very attainable.

But completing all areas with different characters and collecting resources for the game’s construction aspect is likely to set you back a lot of hours.

Here’s the Ball X Pit trophy list in full.

How Many Achievements & Trophies In Ball X Pit?

Your Ball X Pit PlayStation and Xbox journey requires you to conquer 64 PlayStation Trophies and 63 Xbox Achievements to complete the game fully and go the extra mile.

The trophy list is heavily in favor of Bronze Trophies—so it’s good news if you like having a large Bronze collection, for some reason!

See how the Ball X Pit is broken up.

Roguelikes such as this, Balatro, and The Binding of Isaac are always time-sappers. Ball X Pit is worth it, though, so let us know if you intend to get every trophy and achievement via the Insider Gaming Discord.
